nodes.text: A cartoon was released in the galaxy by the Alliance to Restore the Republic between 0 ABY and 1 ABY. It featured a mission undertaken by the Alliance Heroes of Yavin, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Leia Organa and Chewbacca, on Panna Prime, where they encountered the bounty hunter Boba Fett. The cartoon was narrated by Captain Kazan, the commander of the cruiser RS Revenge. It was edited and released by the Alliance, and Chewbacca gifted a copy to his son Lumpawarrump, who cherished the recording and watched it frequently, including during the Galactic Empire's blockade of the planet Kashyyyk.
The cartoon appeared in The Story of the Faithful Wookiee, written by George Lucas and animated by Nelvana studios. and aired in 1978 as part of The Star Wars Holiday Special.
